i1.name: Pit Grit
description: {{sbc|Innate - Heavy Hands:}} '''Sett's''' basic attacks alternate between a {{as|Left Punch|armor}} and a {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}} [[on-attack]]. '''Sett''' begins attacking with a {{as|Left Punch|armor}}, and will reset back to it after 2 seconds of not performing a {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}}.

'''Sett's''' {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}} gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}, attacks at 8 times the {{as|Left Punch's|armor}} {{as|attack speed}}, and deals {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|5 to 90}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Heart of the Half-Beast:}} '''Sett''' [[health regeneration|regenerates]] {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|4|0.25;0.5;1;2|1 to 16}} health}} per second for every {{as|5% of his {{sti|'''missing''' health}}}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate - Heavy Hands: Sett's basic attacks alternate between a Left Punch and a Right Punch on-attack. Sett begins attacking with a Left Punch, and will reset back to it after 2 seconds of not performing a Right Punch.Sett's Right Punch gains 50 bonus range, attacks at 8 times the Left Punch's attack speed, and deals Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 5 to 90 (+ 50% bonus AD) bonus physical damage.Innate - Heart of the Half-Beast: Sett health regeneration Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 4 0.25;0.5;1;2 1 to 16 health per second for every 5% of his missing health.
i1.notes:
* The {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}} does not grant {{as|{{sti|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, rather is fixed at {{as|800% of the {{as|Left Punch's|armor}} {{sti|'''total''' attack speed}}}} and it is unaffected by {{tip|cripple|cripples}} and attack speed buffs (i.e {{ri|Hail of Blades}}) for the duration.
* The bonus physical damage from the {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}} benefits from {{stil|life steal}}.

q1.name: Knuckle Down
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sett''' gains ''Looking for a Fight'' for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and empowers his next two [[basic attack]]s within 5 seconds to deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}. The empowered attacks are guaranteed to be a {{as|Left Punch|Armor}} followed by a {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}}, resetting his current {{ai|Pit Grit|Sett}} state (if applicable) and ignoring the usual time-out period for a follow-up {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}}.
Activation will {{tip|basic attack reset|reset}} '''Sett's''' basic attack timer.
{{sbc|Looking for a Fight:}} '''Sett''' gains {{sti|movement speed|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when he moves towards a {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion within 2000 units.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Sett gains Looking for a Fight for 1.5 seconds and empowers his next two basic attacks within 5 seconds to deal bonus physical damage. The empowered attacks are guaranteed to be a Left Punch followed by a Right Punch, resetting his current Pit Grit state (if applicable) and ignoring the usual time-out period for a follow-up Right Punch.Activation will reset Sett's basic attack timer.Looking for a Fight: Sett gains 30% bonus movement speed when he moves towards a visible enemy champion within 2000 units.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ 1% {{as|(+ {{ap|1 to 3}}% per 100 AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|10*2 to 50*2}} {{as|(+ 2% {{as|(+ {{ap|1*2 to 3*2}}% per 100 AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
q1.notes: * {{Pending for test}}: ''Knuckle Down's '' interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ 1% {{as|(+ {{ap|1 to 3}}% per 100 AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|10*2 to 50*2}} {{as|(+ 2% {{as|(+ {{ap|1*2 to 3*2}}% per 100 AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}

• Bonus Physical Damage: (+ 1% (+ % per 100 AD) of target's maximum health)
  • Total Bonus Damage: (+ 2% (+ % per 100 AD) of target's maximum health)

w1.name: Haymaker
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Sett''' stores 100% of {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after resistances and modifiers.}} taken as ''Grit'' on his resource bar, up to {{as|50% of his {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}}. Each instance of stored ''Grit'' decays by 30% every second after 4 seconds.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Sett''' immediately gains a {{tip|shield}} equal to his expended ''Grit'' for 3 seconds, decaying after {{fd|0.75}} seconds, and indicates an area in the target direction.
After the cast time, he unleashes a blast, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in the area, and {{ccs|{{as|true damage}}|true}} instead to those in the center.
w1.descriptionHtml: Passive: Sett stores 100% of post-mitigation damage taken as Grit on his resource bar, up to 50% of his maximum health. Each instance of stored Grit decays by 30% every second after 4 seconds.Active: Sett immediately gains a shield equal to his expended Grit for 3 seconds, decaying after 0.75 seconds, and indicates an area in the target direction.After the cast time, he unleashes a blast, dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area, and true damage true">Unknown value: ccs true damage true instead to those in the center.
leveling: {{st|Physical / True Damage|{{ap|80 to 160}} (+ 25% {{as|(+ 10% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of expended ''Grit'')}}
w1.notes:
* The shield is created immediately and will decay after the blast delay. 
** The buff for the shield is named ''Down But Not Out''.
* '''Sett''' does not store {{as|Grit|gold}} from damage that was mitigated by {{tip|shield|shields}}.
* ''Haymaker'' will cast from wherever '''Sett''' is at the end of the cast time.
* '''Sett''' will turn towards the target direction at the start of the cast time.
* {{pending for test}} Interaction with {{si|Flash}} (likely special in overriding target direction) and other forced movement that changes '''Sett's''' facing direction before the end of the cast time.
* '''Sett''' will glow when attaining 90% {{as|Grit|gold}}. Casting ''Haymaker'' at this amount has a different visual and audio effect.
[[File:90%_Grit_Sett.png|thumb|left|'''Sett''' will turn {{color|#FFDF00|'''golden'''}} ''(base skin)''.]]
w1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  100 as 100 and riot's value 0,0,0,0,0 as 0

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Physical / True Damage|{{ap|80 to 160}} (+ 25% {{as|(+ 10% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of expended ''Grit'')}}
effects.str: • Physical / True Damage: (+ 25% (+ 10% per 100 bonus AD) of expended Grit)

e1.name: Facebreaker
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sett''' {{tip|airborne|pulls in}} enemies at his front and back in the target direction, dealing them {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 50% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
If ''Facebreaker'' affects at least one enemy on each side, all enemies are {{tip|stun|stunned}} for 1 second upon landing.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Sett pulls in enemies at his front and back in the target direction, dealing them physical damage and slowing them by 50% for 0.5 seconds.If Facebreaker affects at least one enemy on each side, all enemies are stunned for 1 second upon landing.
e1.notes:
* '''Sett''' will attempt to basic attack the closest target after ''Facebreaker''.
* A target will rebound to '''Sett's''' '''base''' attack range.
* There is a smaller affected area at '''Sett's''' sides, the [[spell indicator]] does not illustrate this for practical reasons.
* If targets on either opposite side are protected by {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}}, ''Facebreaker'' will not {{tip|stun}}.

r1.name: The Show Stopper
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sett''' instantly {{tip|suppression|suppresses}} and {{tip|true sight|reveals}} the target enemy {{tip|champion}} and {{tip|dashes}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} a {{tt|fixed distance|400 units past target location}} toward and past them, {{tip|attached|attaching}} the target to him when he reaches them and carrying them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds before slamming them into the ground.

Enemies within the epicenter take {{ccs|{{as|physical damage}}|physical}}. Enemies outside of the epicenter but within the impact area take {{as|physical damage}}, reduced by up to 75% at the edge. All enemies hit are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 99% for 1 second.
''The dash will prematurely end upon reaching a wall that cannot be dashed through by '''Sett'''.''
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Sett instantly suppresses and reveals the target enemy champion and dashes with displacement immunity a fixed distance toward and past them, attaching the target to him when he reaches them and carrying them for 1.5 seconds before slamming them into the ground.Enemies within the epicenter take physical damage physical">Unknown value: ccs physical damage physical. Enemies outside of the epicenter but within the impact area take physical damage, reduced by up to 75% at the edge. All enemies hit are slowed by 99% for 1 second.The dash will prematurely end upon reaching a wall that cannot be dashed through by Sett.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|40 to 60}}% of primary target's '''bonus''' health)}}|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|200*0.25 to 400*0.25}} {{as|(+ 25% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|40*0.25 to 60*0.25}}% of primary target's '''bonus''' health)}}}}
r1.notes:
* The "crater" VFX does not represent the entire explosion radius. Additionally, the explosion radius is non-uniform.{{bug|2}}
* '''Sett''' lands 200 units farther from the impact, the damage is applied after the time it takes to reposition.
* If the target is 2000 or more units away before '''Sett''' reaches them, they will not be {{tip|attach|attached}} to '''Sett'''. The {{tip|suppression}} will last 5 seconds.{{bug}}
* If '''Sett''' dies during ''The Show Stopper'', the ability is canceled and the target detaches and the {{tip|suppression}} ends immediately.
** The same happens when '''Sett''' enters {{tip|resurrection}}, unless he casted ''The Show Stopper'' the moment before he entered it, which causes him to perform the ability even while ''resurrecting''.{{bug}}
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} before the attachment, ''The Show Stopper'' will cancel; '''Sett''' will stop the dash immediately.
* '''Sett''' will perform ''The Show Stopper'' even if the target resists the attachment or detaches from him, which can be done so by negating or removing the {{tip|suppression}}. This includes if the target:
** Has a {{tip|spell shield}}.
** Is {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} or {{tip|displacement immune}}.
** Uses a {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} effect, either before or after the attachment.
** {{tip|Death|Dies}} or enters {{tip|resurrection}}.
** Is {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench|Devoured}}.
